code: import GitHubIcon from'@material-ui/icons/GitHub';import LinkedInIcon from'@material-ui/icons/LinkedIn';import{about}from'../../portfolio';import'./About.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const About=()=>{const{photo,name,role,description,resume,social}=about;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"about center",children:[photo&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{height:"450px",alt:"Avatar placeholder",src:photo,style:{marginBottom:'20px'}}),name&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h1",{children:["Hi, I am ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"about__name",children:[name,"."]})]}),role&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h2",{className:"about__role",children:["A ",role,"."]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"about__desc",children:description&&description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"about__contact center",children:[resume&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:resume,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{type:"button",className:"btn btn--outline",children:"Resume"})}),social&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[social.github&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:social.github,"aria-label":"github",className:"link link--icon",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(GitHubIcon,{})}),social.linkedin&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:social.linkedin,"aria-label":"linkedin",className:"link link--icon",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(LinkedInIcon,{})})]})]})]});};export default About;
